sentences.en: A cloud is a mass of vapor in the sky.
sentences.cn: 云是天空中的水汽团块。

sentences.en: An airplane flew across the sky trailing white vapor.
sentences.cn: 一架飞机从空中飞过,尾部拖着一条水汽形成的白线.

sentences.en: And so, you make not only water vapor, NOX but you make some nitrous oxides, NOX, or nox as it is known, and this is the precursor to smog.
sentences.cn: 这样不仅仅得到的水蒸气，但是你会得到一些氮氧化物，或者如大家所知到的nox，这是烟雾的前驱体。

sentences.en: Most of atmosphere's water vapor comes from evaporation of sea water.
sentences.cn: 大气中的水汽大部分来自海水蒸发.

sentences.en: Now new results from the Hollywood-esque moonshot reveal lots of water in a crater where the sun never shines — 41 gallons of ice and vapor.
sentences.cn: 现在，来自好莱坞式的月球探测器的新结果显示，在太阳永远照不到的弹坑里有很多水——41加仑冰和水蒸气。

sentences.en: So, if you start with sodium vapor and chlorine gas, electron transfer will occur.
sentences.cn: 所以，如果从以钠蒸汽和氯气开始，电子传递就会发生了。

sentences.en: The car windows were fogged with vapor.
sentences.cn: 车窗上满是雾气。

sentences.en: The cold wind condenses vapor into rain.
sentences.cn: 冷风使水蒸气凝结成雨.

sentences.en: The evaporator vapor lines are fitted with an entrainment separator.
sentences.cn: 蒸发器的蒸汽线装有雾沫分离器.

sentences.en: The light beam passes through the container holding the vapor.
sentences.cn: 光束通过盛蒸汽的容器.

sentences.en: The phenomenon of vapor explosions threatens the safe storage and transportation of liquefied petroleum gas.
sentences.cn: 液化石油气蒸汽爆炸是对其安全储运构成很大威胁的一种观象。

sentences.en: The two principal combustion products are water vapor and carbon dioxide.
sentences.cn: 两种主要的燃烧产物是水蒸气和二氧化碳。

sentences.en: This new machine sometimes transpires a lot of hot vapor.
sentences.cn: 这部机器有时排出大量的热气.

sentences.en: This system traps the gasoline vapor escaping from the fuel tank and carburetor .
sentences.cn: 这个系统能收集从燃油箱和化油器泄漏出来的汽油蒸气。

sentences.en: Typical defects are damaged lines, liquid - fuel and vapor leaks, and missing parts.
sentences.cn: 典型的故障是管路损坏, 燃油和蒸气泄漏, 以及零件丢失.

sentences.en: Vapor jetted from the brood hose as from a little steam engine.
sentences.cn: 大鼻子里象小小的蒸气机似的冒出热气.

sentences.en: Vapor or fumes may condense on piping, ducts, or stack walls.
sentences.cn: 蒸气或尘雾可能在管道, 烟道或烟囱壁上冷凝.

sentences.en: Warm air can contain more water vapor than cold air.
sentences.cn: 热空气要较冷空气容纳更多的水蒸汽.

sentences.en: Water vapor is water in the form of a gas.
sentences.cn: 水蒸气是气态的水.

sentences.en: When nitric acid is poured on copper, a brown vapor gives off.
sentences.cn: 将硝酸倒在铜上, 会散发出一种棕色的蒸气.

words.tran_cn: 似蒸气的；模糊的；忧郁病的
空想的；多蒸气的；雾状的

phrases.tran_cn: 化学气相沉积；化学汽相淀积
饱和蒸气压；饱和蒸汽压；饱和水蒸汽压

trans.tran_cn: 水汽，水蒸气，无实质之物，自夸者，幻想 [药]吸入剂 [古]忧郁（症）
